entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
